doctorInfo.about_1: If you’re concerned about a dermatological issue, let us help. Whether your concern involves acne, a rash, or skin cancer removal, we can ensure the healthy skin you deserve.
doctorInfo.about_2: Facial wrinkles, frown lines, crows’ feet, age spots, or a tattoo you are not happy with? We can help, and we have the full range of services you’re seeking.

home.title: Care Your Skin,
home.subtitle: Care Your Beauty
home.description: Skin care and medical treatments to address specific skin concerns are becoming ever more sophisticated. There’s now an array of non-invasive procedures available to deal with a wide range of skin issues – from sun damage and wrinkles to hyperpigmentation, acne scars and more.

services.description: Our dermatologists use integrative techniques and internal medicine to diagnose a range of dermatological conditions including acne, Chemical peels, Cosmetic injections, Laser surgery, Hair removal or restoration, dermatitis or eczematous conditions, and Skin grafts and flaps.

cards.subtitle: We Provide Service
cards.title: Acne Treatment
cards.description: Acne is a skin condition that occurs when your hair follicles become plugged with oil and dead skin cells. It causes whiteheads, blackheads or pimples. Acne is most common among teenagers, though it affects people of all ages.
cards.description_1: Acne typically appears on your face, forehead, chest, upper back and shoulders because these areas of skin have the most oil (sebaceous) glands. Hair follicles are connected to oil glands.
cards.description_2: Effective acne treatments are available, but acne can be persistent. The pimples and bumps heal slowly, and when one begins to go away, others seem to crop up.

cards.subtitle: We Provide Service
cards.title: PRP for  Hair
cards.description: PRP treatment is a three-step process that uses the platelet-rich plasma found in your blood to promote natural hair growth in the scalp.
cards.description_1: Your blood is drawn — typically from your arm — and put into a centrifuge (a machine that spins rapidly to separate fluids of different densities).
cards.description_2: The platelet-rich plasma is drawn up into a syringe and then injected into areas of the scalp that need increased hair growth.

cards.subtitle: We Provide Service
cards.title: PRP for Face
cards.description: PRP is a facial rejuvenation treatment that uses your own plasma to stimulate collagen production and cell migration, allowing for the elimination of lines, folds, and wrinkles.
cards.description_1: Results from PRP therapy are natural looking and subtle, and they can last for as long as two years.
cards.description_2: The beauty of having PRP treatment is that it uses your own blood; it contains no foreign or synthetic chemicals and therefore has no side effects.

realResult.title: Real results for all Skin and Hair Treatments
realResult.subtitle: VIDEO OF OUR TREATMENTS
realResult.description: Multan Aesthetics dermatologists are experts in performing a wide range of treatments and procedures to treat the health, function and beauty of skin throughout every stage of life. They are the premier medical specialists trained to treat skin and soft tissue in both medically necessary and cosmetic surgical and non-surgical methods.
